Von: Benjamin Schroeder [mailto:schroeder@...]
Gesendet: Freitag, 29. Dezember 2000 15:14
An: junit@egroups.com
Betreff: Re: [junit] auto-run testXYZ-Methods


You can do this by using a constructor of the TestSuite class. "new
TestSuite(MyTestCase.class)" will construct a suite with all of the public
void testXYZ methods of MyTestCase. If a TestCase class doesn't have its
own suite() method, just typing its name into the runner's textfield will
have the same effect.

---------------------------------------------------------------------_->


Yes, this was it! Thanx a lot ...

Wolfgang
